description: Scanned repository structure and identified core project modules and data paths.
Ran Python compilation check for src and app packages to ensure syntax correctness.
Created centralized configuration module defining base paths, data path, model paths and training hyperparameters.
Implemented data loading and feature/target splitting, including optional conversion of sex from string labels to numeric encoding.
Refactored training pipeline to use configuration values, feature helpers, and GridSearchCV for logistic regression hyperparameter tuning with ROC-AUC scoring.
Implemented evaluation script to compute ROC-AUC and classification report on the full dataset and print stored metadata.
Added command-line entry point that calls the training pipeline.
Implemented CLI prediction script that loads the trained model and predicts a single patient outcome from command-line arguments.
Updated FastAPI app to serve the HTML UI, mount static files, cache model loading, and improve error handling when the model file is missing.
Adjusted Analyze button in the HTML template to avoid accidental form submission and rely exclusively on JavaScript for API calls.
Attempted to run training entry point; run failed due to missing third-party dependency joblib, indicating environment setup is required (pip install -r requirements.txt).
Created markdown document summarizing end-to-end workflows for environment setup, training, evaluation, prediction, API usage, and Docker.
